item.title: 原油成本飙升，亚洲炼油企业酝酿削减产量或关闭工厂
item.description: 据贸易商称，由于中国和印度急于替代俄罗斯的原油流量，实物原油成本飙升，这促使亚洲其他地区的炼油厂考虑削减运行率。【原文：A surge in the cost of physical crude cargoes as China and India rush to replace Russian flows is prompting refiners in other parts of Asia to consider cutting run rates, according to traders.】

item.title: 特朗普淡化中国利用 TikTok 监视美国人的威胁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在接受福克斯新闻采访时淡化了 TikTok 对国家安全构成的风险，几天前，他曾为这款社交视频应用程序提供缓刑期，免于通过立法迫使其关闭。【原文：President Donald Trump downplayed the national security risk posed by TikTok in an interview with Fox News on Wednesday, days after offering the social video app a reprieve from legislation that would have forced it to shut down.】

item.title: 印度公司面临双重挑战：需求疲软，利润缩水
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: <strong>2025年澳大利亚经济展望</strong
item.description: 未来的日子会更美好吗，悉尼？【原文：Brighter days ahead, Sydney?】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所在系统故障后向客户支付赔偿金
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.首席执行官海伦-洛夫豪斯（Helen Lofthouse）说，上个月的结算系统故障是一次性的，该公司已采取措施防止这种情况再次发生，因为澳大利亚主要交易所的技术正面临着持续的审查。【原文：ASX Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Helen Lofthouse said last month’s settlement system failure was a one-off and the firm has taken steps to stop it happening again, as technology at Australia’s leading exchange faces ongoing scrutiny.】

item.title: 软银和 OpenAI 计划各出资 190 亿美元收购星际之门，信息报道
item.description: 据《信息报》报道，软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp）和OpenAI分别计划向美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周公布的价值1000亿美元的人工智能项目Stargate投入190亿美元资金。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. and OpenAI each plan to commit $19 billion of capital to Stargate, the $100 billion US AI endeavor President Donald Trump unveiled this week, the Information reported.】

item.title: 中国引导共同基金和保险公司增加股票投资
item.description: 中国政府正在引导地方共同基金和保险公司加大对股票的投资，这是中国政府为支撑疲软的股票市场而采取的最新举措。【原文：China is guiding local mutual funds and insurers to boost investments into stocks in the government’s latest initiative to shore up its ailing equity market.】

item.title: 体育平台 DAZN 为收购 Foxtel 获得 11 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国体育流媒体平台 DAZN Group Ltd. 已准备好 18 亿澳元（11 亿美元）的贷款，为其收购澳大利亚付费电视和流媒体公司 Foxtel Group 提供资金。【原文：British sports streaming platform DAZN Group Ltd. has lined up a A$1.8 billion ($1.1 billion) loan to finance its acquisition of pay-television and streaming company Foxtel Group in Australia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税威胁影响，黄金接近 10 月以来最高点
item.description: 由于交易商考虑到唐纳德-特朗普总统对中国和欧盟的最新关税威胁可能对全球经济产生的影响，黄金维持在10月份以来的最高水平附近。【原文：Gold held near the highest level since October, as traders considered the impact President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats against China and the European Union could have on the global economy.】

item.title: 全球静待特朗普关税影响，日本出口增长
item.description: 由于企业等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普第二个任期内可能采取的贸易政策进一步明朗化，日元走软导致日本 12 月份出口连续第三个月增长。【原文：Japan’s exports rose for a third month in December on the back of a weaker yen, as businesses waited for further clarity on likely US trade policy in President Donald Trump’s second term.】

item.title: BRC 调查显示，近半数英国人预计经济将恶化
item.description: 英国零售商协会（British Retail Consortium）对消费者情绪进行的一项调查显示，今年年初，消费者对英国经济的信心有所下降。【原文：Confidence in the UK economy sunk lower at the start of the year, according to a survey of consumer sentiment by the British Retail Consortium.】

item.title: 新加坡与美国创纪录的收益率差距将因债务供应而扩大
item.description: 随着各国债务供应继续分化，新加坡超长期债券与国债之间的收益率差距预计将从已创纪录的水平扩大。【原文：The yield gap between Singapore’s ultra-long bonds versus Treasuries is expected to expand from already-record levels as the nations’ debt supplies continue to diverge.】

item.title: 新西兰计划通过改组机构吸引外国投资
item.description: 新西兰计划建立一站式服务机构，以促进外国直接投资，推动经济快速增长。【原文：New Zealand plans to establish a one-stop shop to bolster foreign direct investment and drive faster economic growth.】

item.title: MrBeast 正在与 "几位 "感兴趣的买家讨论 TikTok 竞购事宜
item.description: 据一位发言人称，YouTube 当红明星、互联网上收入最高的内容创作者 MrBeast 正在与几个有意在可能的禁令之前收购 TikTok 的集团进行讨论。【原文：MrBeast, the popular YouTube star and the internet’s highest-earning content creator, is holding discussions with several groups that are interested in buying TikTok before a possible ban, according to a spokesperson.】

item.title: 联合国官员在达沃斯抨击世界银行资助的私立医院
item.description: 联合国艾滋病规划署执行主任谴责营利性医疗保健公司在低收入国家的作用，称在某些情况下，这导致拒绝提供紧急护理和拘留病人。【原文：The executive director of UNAIDS denounced the role of for-profit health care companies in low-income countries, saying that in some cases it led to denial of emergency care and patient detentions.】

item.title: 日本央行预计将以 18 年来最大幅度上调利率
item.description: 人们普遍预计，日本央行周五将把基准利率上调18年来的最高幅度，以显示其在推进正常化进程中对通胀可持续性的信心增强。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to raise its benchmark rate Friday by the most in 18 years, in a show of boosted confidence over the sustainability of inflation as it progresses down its normalization path.】

item.title: 石油跌幅扩大，关注库存增加和特朗普的行动
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国原油库存自 11 月中旬以来首次增加后，石油价格走低，市场正在关注唐纳德-特朗普总统就全球贸易做出的进一步承诺。【原文：Oil edged lower after an industry report pointed to the first gain in US crude stockpiles since mid-November, as the market watched for further pledges on global trade from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 卢比奥称美国对菲律宾的防务承诺 "铁板钉钉
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）在批评北京在南海的举动时表示，华盛顿对菲律宾的防务承诺仍然是 "铁板一块"。【原文：US Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Washington’s defense commitments to the Philippines remain “ironclad” while criticizing Beijing’s moves in the South China Sea.】

item.title: 去年的赢家在印度愈演愈烈的经济衰退中损失惨重
item.description: 去年印度股市最大赢家之一的股票在 2025 年开局不佳，原因是投资者加大了对报告收益是否证明市场高估值的审查力度。【原文：Stocks that were among the biggest winners in India last year are seeing a poor start to 2025, as investors dial up scrutiny of whether reported earnings warrant the market’s lofty valuations.】

item.title: 巴西正在商谈开始向日本出口牛肉以威胁美国
item.description: 据南美国家的一个主要行业组织称，世界头号牛肉出口国巴西正在就开始向日本出口牛肉进行深入谈判。【原文：Brazil, the world’s top beef exporter, is in advanced talks to begin shipments to Japan, according to a major industry group in the South American nation.】

item.title: 代币落后于比特币，以太坊迎来华尔街销售团队
item.description: 以太坊曾被视为最有可能挑战比特币卓越加密货币地位的公司，也是最有能力使区块链成为更有用技术的公司。【原文：Ethereum used to be seen as the most likely challenger to Bitcoin’s status as the preeminent cryptocurrency, and the one best positioned to make the blockchain a more useful technology.】

item.title: 作物交易商宣布美湾沿岸地区在南方罕见大雪期间不可抗力
item.description: 由于美国海湾地区遭受 130 年来最严重的暴风雪袭击，全球最大的农作物贸易商之一已停止在该地区码头装运谷物。【原文：One of the world’s biggest crop traders has halted loading of grain vessels at US Gulf terminals as the region’s worst snowstorm in 130 years slams the region.】

item.title: 韩国经济在政治危机中艰难发展
item.description: 在出口增长放缓之际，韩国总统尹锡烈短时间内宣布戒严，打击了消费者信心。【原文：South Korea’s economy continued to sputter last quarter, after President Yoon Suk Yeol’s short-lived declaration of martial law battered consumer confidence at a time when export growth is slowing.】

item.title: 泰国将庆祝东南亚首例同性婚姻
item.description: 数百对男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者今天将在泰国正式结婚，泰国将成为东南亚第一个保障同性伴侣平等婚姻权利的国家。【原文：Hundreds of LGBTQ couples will today officially marry in Thailand, which becomes the first country in Southeast Asia to guarantee equal marital rights for same-sex couples.】

item.title: 中国消费股期待假日消费反弹
item.description: 在今年令人失望的开局之后，投资者正在关注中国最大的消费旺季之一可能会启动中国消费类股票的迹象。【原文：Investors are watching for signs that one of China’s biggest spending seasons may jumpstart the country’s consumer stocks after a disappointing start to the year.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动英伟达合作伙伴 SK 海力士利润创历史新高
item.description: SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：SK Hynix Inc. earned a record quarterly profit after the company extended its lead in memory chips used in datacenters and artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: 福特斯库公司第二季度铁矿石出口增长 1
item.description: 福特斯克有限公司（Fortescue Ltd.）第二季度的铁矿石发货量比上年同期增长了1%，因为人们越来越担心，随着中国需求的减弱，全球最大的炼钢材料生产商将造成供应过剩。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s second-quarter iron ore shipments edged up 1% from the year before, amid rising concern the world’s biggest producers of the steel-making material will create a supply glut as demand from China wanes.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数大涨后亚洲股市将走高：市场综述
item.description: 在对人工智能的乐观情绪和一批重量级企业财报的推动下，大型科技股大涨，使标准普尔500指数（S&P 500）濒临历史最高收盘点位，亚洲股市将继续走高。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to edge higher after a rally in big tech, fueled by optimism over artificial intelligence and a batch of earnings from corporate heavyweights, sent the S&P 500 to the brink of an all-time high close.】

item.title: 微软有望从星际之门合资公司中获益，但资金为零
item.description: 本周二，当唐纳德-特朗普总统与科技高管们一起吹捧由 OpenAI 部分领导的价值数十亿美元的人工智能项目时，一个问题涌上心头：微软公司在哪里？【原文：When President Donald Trump joined tech executives on Tuesday to tout a multibillion-dollar artificial intelligence project led in part by OpenAI, one question sprang to mind: Where’s Microsoft Corp.?】

item.title: 日本热捧外国股票有可能使日元进一步走低
item.description: 日本散户投资者对海外股票的渴求进一步拖累了日元，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税和与美国的巨大利率差距所带来的下行风险更是雪上加霜。【原文：Japanese retail investors’ hunger for overseas equities is weighing further on the yen, adding to downside risks posed by tariffs from Donald Trump and the wide interest-rate gap with the US.】
